+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #505706 +++

When styling an element with  { display:inline-table;position:absolute; } we end up treating it as block-level because the mOriginalDisplay of the table-outer is "table", since it inherits display from the table-inner _after_ EnsureBlockDisplay() on the table-inner.

comments.text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #505706 +++

When styling an element with  { display:inline-table;position:absolute; } we end up treating it as block-level because the mOriginalDisplay of the table-outer is "table", since it inherits display from the table-inner _after_ EnsureBlockDisplay() on the table-inner.
